name: CoReSyFRasterToPolygon
description: CoReSyF tool that creates a shapefile with a layer containing polygon features for all connected regions of pixels in the raster sharing a common pixel value. Each polygon is created with an attribute indicating the pixel value of that polygon. The shapefile contains a layer with its own name, but the user can specify the fieldname for the pixel values.

parameters.name: band
parameters.description: Indicate the source band to process

parameters.name: Field Name
parameters.description: Name of the field to create
